Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill expressed dissatisfaction with his T20I batting performances and aims to improve ahead of the next cycle.
Gill is set to open with Yashasvi Jaiswal, signaling a new era for India in T20Is.
Gill is confident of working well with India's new T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shubman Gill is looking to transfer his form in ODIs to the shortest format of the game.
Gill's contrasting starts to the two white-ball formats have reflected in how selectors have looked at the player in the respective formats.
Others: India's tour of Sri Lanka begins with a T20I on 27 July, 2024.
